questions.question: Calculate the discharge for an oil of viscousity 0.02 Ns/m2 flowing between two stationary parallel plates 1.2 m wide maintained 10 mm apart. The velocity midway between the plates is 2.2 m/s.
Calculate the discharge for an oil of viscousity 0.02 Ns/m2 flowing between two stationary parallel plates 0.9 m wide maintained 8 mm apart. The velocity midway between the plates is 2.1 m/s.
